name: Cave Giant
description: The Cave Giant is a massive creature with raw physical strength, characterized by its enormous size and tusks, capable of inflicting substantial melee damage.
memorable: The cave giant's sunlight petrification ability makes it a unique threat, especially in environments with light exposure.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory and engage in combat.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other giants or cave-dwelling creatures.
environment: Often found in dark caves or subterranean areas.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and durability, with powerful melee and ranged attacks.
weaknesses: Severely weakened and vulnerable when exposed to sunlight.
attacks: Utilizes multi-attack options featuring handaxe slashes and tusk strikes, along with a strong rock throw.
most_powerful_ability: Sunlight Petrification inflicts heavy penalties in sunlight and can lead to immobility if defeated under such conditions.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception score of 15.
skills: Excels at athletics, with strong proficiency in perception and survival.
additional_information: Has a very high strength score of 27.
Possesses a strong constitution score of 22, ensuring resilience.
Below-average intelligence and charisma, limiting strategic and social capabilities.
Can knock over opponents with its tusks attack.
Vulnerable to radiant damage when in direct sunlight.
